meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Aaron Yeater Umiko Post Andy Seff Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4062.

td.p: Aaron Yeater, a graduate student from New Haven, Connecticut
Umiko Post, a stay-at-home mom from Peoria, Illinois
Andy Seff, a law student from Baltimore, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $13,000)

tr.td: OFFICIAL STATE FOODS
HOBBIES
CLASSIC FILMS IN OTHER WORDS
I FEEL LIKE DANCIN'!
USURPED IDEAS OF 3rd PARTIES
ENDS IN "TRY"
